description:
Checklist Pro will become your best friend right away after usage; the application is a very simple one that keeps track of tasks that need to be done without forgetting any of them, simply store and add your list of to-dos & the things you need to pack when traveling, shopping, camping, or your basic grocery list.

With the ability to classify you items into bulks inside one list guarantees the simplicity of the packing process, you can now add an infinite number of lists which will make you and Checklist Pro inseparable, the application will help you relax even before you travel.  

With the filters available in the application, you will instantly have the full picture at what items you forgot and which ones you skipped.  

Check List Pro saves a priority to each one of the items in the list so you won’t miss the most important ones.  

No matter what you profession or age is, we all need something to remind us of our lists.  With Checklist Pro will be able to save your list in the application and share your lists with your family and friends.
